short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A simple extension that opens a new tap in App mode. Open repository: https://github.com/andr3marra/window-popup.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: With this extension you can open the current tab in a new window with app mode. App mode is just a browser windows without address bar or navigation buttons, reducing cluster and improving focus.
